function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of medical images and test reports through 5G network.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of patient condition due to image distortion or data loss.","Mitigation":"Validation of image and data integrity before diagnosis, use of backup transmission methods for critical data.","Technologies":"DICOM protocol implementation, real-time image validation algorithms.","People":"Suspected patients, remote doctors, on-site medical staff.","Owner":"Medical institutions, healthcare providers."}]}
